DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to determine whether an intensive web-based titration system, called PANDIT (Patient Assisting Net-based Diabetes Insulin Titration), is effective in improving glycaemic control in patients with diabetes mellitus type 2 using a basal insulin, compared to standard care.
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Insulin Titration - An Efficacy Study
